Text.Page:
The pirates are guarding a slaver pier on behalf of the Kazuur Syndicate. Thanks to you, , the gulas can't use their own guards anymore.

Doesn't matter who's guarding that pier, though. We've got to keep ships from docking there.

That means eliminating the {@LinkCreature:12#13#Red Lash clawriders}. No captain dealing with slavers will dock at an unguarded pier, so the Kazuur Syndicate can't move their slaves.
You're the slave trade's worst nightmare, <PCNAME>. The gods smile on your dedication to justice!
